metadata.name: Renamed FTP.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed "ftp.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ftp.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ftp.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed "ftp.exe" binary based on the PE metadata fields

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.name False positive: Unknown Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Ftp/
